trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath keeneye has a parcel clasped firmly in his claws. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_01<tab>All of the Vath keeneye's attempts to deliver a package addressed to a dragon by the name of Uhm Ala have ended in dismal failure. Aside from the name stenciled neatly on the parcel, the only tidbit of information he has to go on is that Uhm Ala has yellow scales. Unfortunately, many dragons residing in the towers fit this description. He thinks that maybe an experienced adventurer like you will have better luck delivering the package, and asks that you take over this assignment for him. With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase that contains the name “Uhm Ala” to find the dragon whose package remains undelivered.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_02<tab>You approach several yellow-scaled dragons, none of which turn out to be the great Uhm Ala. You do, however, gain some valuable insight from speaking to them, and now know to look for a regal dragon residing somewhere within the tower. Make your way to the upper level of Anyx Trine and with the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Uhm Ala” to ascertain the identity of the yellow dragon that dwells there.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_03<tab>You finally find Uhm Ala. Present his parcel to him.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_04<tab>You deliver the package to Uhm Ala. Return to Loth ast Vath and report to the Vath keeneye.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEQ_05<tab>You report back to the Vath keeneye, who thanks you for your service. He laments the fact that he has so much trouble telling the dragons apart.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Uhm Ala” to ascertain the yellow dragon's identity.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Uhm Ala” to ascertain the yellow dragon's identity.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the package to the yellow-scaled dragon.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_TODO_03<tab>Report to the Vath keeneye.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>Greetings, adventurer! We are most happy to see you. <click> <click> We are facing much trouble with a package we must deliver.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>You see, this package is addressed to a dragon by the name of Uhm Ala. He is said to reside in Anyx Trine. Aside from this, we only know that he is yellow of scale.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>No matter how hard we try, we cannot identify the intended recipient. There are too many dragons with yellow scales! So every day we return, claws heavy, and no closer to delivering our package.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_003<tab>We think maybe an expert adventurer like yourself can easily recognize him! Please, great hunter, take this to him. Uhm Ala must be very eager to receive his order.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONA02277_000_010<tab>What is it you have come here for, child of man?

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase that contains the name “Uhm Ala” to find the dragon whose package remains undelivered.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Uhm Ala

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONA02277_000_013<tab>You think me to be the great Uhm Ala? How absurd! Would such a distinguished dragon be wandering about the lower levels of the tower like some common vagrant? I should think not!
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONA02277_000_015<tab>Saying I look like Uhm Ala is akin to comparing one of your kings to a peasant. Hmph. Do all of your people so disrespect your betters?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONB02277_000_020<tab>Child of man...wandering about our towers? A rare sight, indeed! Are you lost, my friend?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONB02277_000_021<tab>Ha ha ha! You honor me! While we may live the life of a thousand men, never did I think I would see the day I was mistaken for the great Uhm Ala.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONB02277_000_025<tab>While I would like to think there is some resemblance, nothing could be further from the truth. Ha ha ha! I wish you the best of luck in your search.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONC02277_000_030<tab>Is there something you need?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONC02277_000_031<tab>Your eyesight must be failing you, young one. Do I truly look as though I could be the esteemed Uhm Ala?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_DRAGONC02277_000_035<tab>We may both be possessed of yellow scales, but that is the extent of our similarities.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_100_038<tab>Who is it that dares disturb me at this hour?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_100_039<tab>Uhm Ala? Yes, that is I.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_000_040<tab>For what reason have you come?
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_000_041<tab>You have a package for me? Ah, yes. I have long awaited its arrival─ever since that accursed flea infestation.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_100_042<tab>I, Uhm Ala, reduced to such methods. How humiliating that I must conceal my condition. But now, with this repellent, I am free from this burden at last.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_OOMALA_000_045<tab>A single spritz of this vilekin repellent and these insufferable pests will finally know my pain.

TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_050<tab>We do not know how to thank you, adventurer. You are most kind. Without your help Uhm Ala would never have received his parcel! All the dragons─they are near impossible to tell apart.
TEXT_BANGNA602_02277_SEARCHER_000_051<tab>Then again, we are also often told that we all look alike. <click> <click> We find this very funny considering every one of us looks so very different!
